dauer.label: How long is your training in full-time?
dauer.tooltip: Write how many months your training usually takes in full-time.

stunden.label: How many hours per week does the full-time training have?
stunden.tooltip: Count all hours, including school hours.

teilzeit.label: What part-time percentage do you want?
teilzeit.tooltip: For part-time training, you must work at least 50%.

vk.heading: Reasons for shorter training
vk.helper: Choose all options that fit you.

abitur.label: Do you have a high school diploma (Abitur)?
abitur.tooltip: If you have a high school diploma, you can shorten your training by 1 year.

realschule.label: Did you finish secondary school (Realschule)?
realschule.tooltip: If you finished secondary school, you can shorten your training by 6 months.

alter21.label: Are you older than 21?
alter21.tooltip: If you are older, your experience counts. Your training can then be shorter.

vork.label: Do you already have work experience in this field?
vork.tooltip: If you have worked in this job before, your training can be shorter.

res.headline: Your part-time training
res.helper: Here you can see your details and the result.
res.notes:
• This calculation is only a help.
  • The result is not official.
  • Talk about the result with your training company.
  • Part-time training is possible if you do at least 50% of the normal time.

errors.tooShort: Training can be shortened by up to 12 months only!
errors.tooLong: Training can be at most 1.5 times longer!

reset.confirm: Do you really want to reset all data?
